page.title: 03Clothes we wear in school
page.content: In our school we all wear a uniform.We wear this because then we will not feel left out,if we are not all that well off.We also wear a uniform so that we look smart and neat.Our school has a netball team, they wear a blue mini skirt and a blue aertex top and bib with white letters.We also have a P.E. kit, but we don't have to wear it,it is a white aertex T-Shirt and blue shorts. We have a winter and summer uniform. The winter uniform is a navy skirt, a white blouse and a royal blue jumper. The summer uniform is a blue and white checked dress with short socks. Our school also has a fooball team. They wear a blue aertex T-Shirt and white or blue shorts,blue socks and black football boots. By Clare Hofmann and Ann Riddy.
